Attribute.AttributeName: Gendarme.Framework.Solution("Verify the code logic and, if required, replace the defective logic with one that works with negative values too.")
Gendarme.Framework.Problem("This method looks like it check if an integer is odd or even but the implementation wont work on negative integers.")

Docs.summary: This rule checks for incomplete oddness checks inside methods. A common approach is doing a modulo two (% 2) and comparing the result with one (1). This logic does not work for negative integers (where minus one is returned). A better (and faster) approach is to check the least significant bit of the integer.
Docs.remarks: This rule is available since Gendarme 2.0
